Products

  • Home
  • Products

Our Product

KALIMARK BOVONTO

200ml, 250ml, 300ml, 500ml, 1.5 Lts

This is an endless bliss! It owned millions of hearts for its unique taste. A symphony of flavour that has delighted palates since 1959, crafting moments of pure joy in every sip, a timeless embodiment of taste and tradition Kalimark Bovonto flies at the zenith among the competitors that it is exposed to. “Son of the South” would best suit a title to Bovonto. Non Caffeinated grapy fizzy soft drink

Our Product

KALIMARK VIBRO

200ml, 250ml, 300ml, 500ml, 1.5 Lts

Sip into bliss with Vibro—a symphony of vibrant roses in a non-caffeinated, fizzy embrace. Let each effervescent bubble whisper the language of love, turning every moment into a beautiful celebration of flavor and joy.

Our Product

KALIMARK ZIMZO

200ml, 250ml, 300ml, 500ml, 1.5 Lts

Quench your thirst with Zimzo Lemon! Experience the burst of fresh citrus goodness that breathes new life into every sip. Elevate your refreshment game with this zingy delight—refreshment redefined

Our Product

KALIMARK TIGO

200ml, 250ml, 300ml, 500ml, 1.5 Lts

Oranges in the pet bottles!! And that’s called Tigo!! Give yourself an orangy bonaza with Tigo. Tigo-The orangy delight that you shouldn’t miss !!

Our Product

KALIMARK PASSION FRUIT

200ml, 250ml, 300ml, 500ml, 1.5 Lts

Indulge in the vibrant burst of Passion Burst – a tangy passion fruit fizzy drink that’s a symphony of flavor in every bubble. Elevate your refreshment with the exotic allure of passion fruit, promising a sip of pure delight.

Our Product

KALIMARK GOLI SODA

200ml, 250ml, 300ml, 500ml, 1.5 Lts

Journey into nostalgia with Goli Soda’s timeless charm and modern flair. Experience the effervescence of beloved flavors like Blueberry, Gulab Paneer Soda, Salty Lemon, Lemon, and Orange—a symphony of taste that refreshes both the palate and memories.

Our Product

KALIMARK JINJI

200ml, 250ml, 300ml, 500ml, 1.5 Lts

Spice up your moments with Jinji – Jinger flavored Soda! A burst of zesty goodness in every sip, refreshing like no other. Why settle for ordinary when you can elevate your refreshment experience with Jinji?

Our Product

KALIMARK RHYNO

200ml, 250ml, 300ml, 500ml, 1.5 Lts

Kalimark’s “Rhyno” Energy Drink offers a revitalizing boost with a burst of flavors, featuring invigorating Strawberry and refreshing Blueberry options for a unique and energizing experience.

Our Product

KALIMARK FLAVOURED MILK

200ml, 250ml, 300ml, 500ml, 1.5 Lts

Immerse yourself in the delightful taste of Kalimark’s Flavoured Milk range, featuring the rich and creamy goodness of Vanilla, the floral delight of Rose, the nutty allure of Almond, the irresistible Choco Blast and the traditional Jigarthanda —each sip is a symphony of flavors meticulously crafted for your enjoyment. Embark on a journey of indulgence with our luscious and diverse selection of premium flavored milks.

Our Product

FRUTANG

200ml, 250ml, 300ml, 500ml, 1.5 Lts

Indulge in the timeless allure of Frutang, a mango elixir born in 1978. Sip on decades of perfection in every drop, where the essence of ripe mangoes meets a legacy of exquisite taste.

Our Product

KALIMARK KALIKOLA

200ml, 250ml, 300ml, 500ml, 1.5 Lts

Quench your thirst with Kalimark Kalikola, a refreshing cola drink that combines bold, bubbly goodness with a burst of timeless flavor. Experience the classic taste that defines refreshment, perfectly crafted for moments of joy

Our Product

KALIMARK PRIESTLEY CLUB SODA

200ml, 250ml, 300ml, 500ml, 1.5 Lts

Experience effervescent bliss with Kalimark’s Priestley Club Soda – a sparkling elixir that transcends refreshment. Immerse yourself in the crisp, invigorating bubbles, curated to elevate every moment to a celebration of pure, timeless joy.

Our Product

KALIMARK LEMON

200ml, 250ml, 300ml, 500ml, 1.5 Lts

Awaken your taste buds with Kalimark Cloudy Lemon, a robust and zesty lemon drink that packs a punch of citrusy freshness. Savor the intense burst of tangy flavor in every sip, delivering a refreshing experience that’s truly invigorating.

Our Product

KALIMARK JEERA

200ml, 250ml, 300ml, 500ml, 1.5 Lts

Quench your thirst with Kalimark Jeera Soft Drink, a refreshing blend of natural cumin flavor and fizzy delight. Experience the perfect harmony of spice and sweetness in every sip, a unique and invigorating beverage for a taste that stands out.

Our Product

KALIMARK WATER

200ml, 250ml, 300ml, 500ml, 1.5 Lts

Kalimark Aqua Pure Water, a pristine sip of purity that hydrates and refreshes. Straight from the source to your bottle, experience the crisp taste of clean, premium water for a revitalizing hydration experience.
